title: Long story short I NEED A DUO/ TRIO partner
body: Im not gonna lie. im in bronze 5.  after multiple failed attemps at promos and constantly getting trolled no matter how hard i carry , i got demoted and scewed over. Bronze is a fucking nightmare where people just dont give 2 fucks. I need a partner/s to help me , i just need soemone else to look at other lanes and il take care of my part. I promise im pretty good. i will never feed ever though i have bad games , theyre rare. I just really need someone to climb ranked with. I have the worst luck in match making and i would really appreciate the help. and i promise il do my part to carry.  Please Add TrustinTommorow  please help a pal out

replies.body:
yo im bronze 1 and my adc friend is bronze 5 we're climbing elo rn so if you wanna join us just ask ^^
we were both silver last season but trolling took us down hard
~EnderBroseph~
k i gotchu im s3 tho
